description: Tarragon is a species of plant unlike any other. Its unique flavor and aroma make it a perfect kitchen companion. It is a member of the Artemisia family, which makes it incredibly healthy. It's packed full of essential vitamins and nutrients including Vitamin A, Vitamin C, and iron. These vitamins help support your overall health and wellbeing. As well as being incredibly nutritious, tarragon has a wonderfully distinctive taste that works well with almost any meal. Whether you add it to soup, salad, or eggs, it will elevate the flavor of your dish to a whole new level. It's no wonder tarragon has been a culinary favorite for centuries.
